parameters.formDescription: Make Your Page Convert Like a Top 1% Funnel

options.systemMessage:
=You are a world-class Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO) expert.

Your mission is to analyze my landing page and return with the most important actions the business should take to improve conversions. No fluff, no filler ‚Äî just what matters most.

üéØ YOUR RESPONSE MUST FOLLOW THIS STRUCTURE:

1) Each item should start with a strong action verb (e.g., Replace, Add, Remove, Rewrite, Rearrange, Clarify, Simplify, Make visible, etc.)

2) Be specific. Tell me exactly what to do ‚Äî what headline to change, what section to remove, what to add and where.

3) Every recommendation must be based on the actual landing page content. No generic advice.

4) Prioritize modern, high-impact CRO ideas relevant to 2024 digital audiences.

5) Keep it easy to understand and implement. No heavy dev work required.

6) Focus on conversion levers: clarity, relevance, trust, desire, urgency, and friction reduction.

parameters.completionTitle: Here are 5 Things You Should Improve üßê

attributes.name: Improvement Tip 1
attributes.description: =The 1st most important improvement tip without any symbol, add relevent Emoji

parameters.content:
# üõ† Setup Guide  
## **Author:** [Rakin Jakaria](https://www.youtube.com/@rakinjakaria)

Follow these steps to get your Landing Page Analyzer workflow up and running: 

1. **Configure Google Gemini API Credentials**  
   - Navigate to the "Google Gemini Chat Model" node in your workflow.  
   - Ensure your Google Gemini (PaLM) API credentials are properly set up in your N8N instance.  
   - If you don't have an API key, obtain one from [Google AI Studio](https://aistudio.google.com/apikey).  

2. **Test the Webhook Form (Optional)**  
   - The workflow starts with a form submission trigger.  
   - If you plan to embed this in a website or app, ensure the webhook URL is correctly configured and accessible.  

3. **Verify HTTP Request Node**  
   - The workflow fetches the landing page content via HTTP.  
   - Ensure the target URLs are publicly accessible and not behind authentication.  

4. **Review AI Agent Instructions**  
   - The AI Agent node includes a system prompt for CRO analysis.  
   - Customize the prompt if needed to align with your specific goals or industry.  

Once these steps are complete, your Landing Page Analyzer is ready to use! Submit a URL via the form to receive actionable CRO improvements. üöÄ

## Start here: Step-by Step Youtube Tutorial :star:
[![I Built an Auto Lead Finder AI Agent](https://img.youtube.com/vi/gsFl25jw-7I/sddefault.jpg)](https://youtu.be/gsFl25jw-7I)
